ubci 0.0.2
  • Reference
  • Changelog

get coin price

Source: R/ubci_get.R
ubci_get.Rd

get coin price data from source. Source is https://upbit.com/exchange. This page shows the multiple cryptocurrency price.

ubci_get(code, from, to)

Arguments

code

coin name fom ubci_get_options() link "UPBIT.KRW-BTC".
from

Optional for various time series. A character string representing a start date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
to

Optional for various time series. A character string representing an end date in YYYY-MM-DD format.

Value

Return type is tibble has columes contain code, date, open, high, low, close, volume.

Examples

btc <- ubci_get(code = "UPBIT.KRW-BTC")
btc
#> # A tibble: 268 x 7
#>    code          date          open    high     low   close volume
#>    <chr>         <date>       <dbl>   <dbl>   <dbl>   <dbl>  <dbl>
#>  1 UPBIT.KRW-BTC 2018-06-19 7461000 7649000 7428000 7553000  3189.
#>  2 UPBIT.KRW-BTC 2018-06-18 7231000 7550000 7135000 7461000  3051.
#>  3 UPBIT.KRW-BTC 2018-06-17 7275000 7329000 7206000 7218000  1502.
#>  4 UPBIT.KRW-BTC 2018-06-16 7180000 7336000 7116000 7277000  2031.
#>  5 UPBIT.KRW-BTC 2018-06-15 7363000 7399000 7151000 7180000  3302.
#>  6 UPBIT.KRW-BTC 2018-06-14 7039000 7380000 6977000 7355000  6512.
#>  7 UPBIT.KRW-BTC 2018-06-13 7350000 7390000 6951000 7040000  4943.
#>  8 UPBIT.KRW-BTC 2018-06-12 7635000 7685000 7270000 7350000  5044.

#> 10 UPBIT.KRW-BTC 2018-06-10 8233000 8247000 7425000 7576000  7445.
